entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 17.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 70%
